name: MEC Bear Cub Hat - Infants to Children
description:
Cozy and wind-resistant, to keep little ears happy. With fleecy earflaps secured by a tidy patch of Velcro®, this cozy number stays put during afternoons in the park.Made of fleeced polyester.Velcro patch keeps flaps together and secure.Tiny creature ears yield maximum cuteness.

        Sustainability
